page.title: 14Tourism in Bromp on Swale
page.content:
Tourists have been coming to Brompton on Swale for the past 20 to 25 years . Tourists come to Brompton for the races, for Richmond and the Dales .
The races take place at the race-course at Catterick Bridge. People come from all over the country. The Bridge House Hotel can get over crowded on race days.
The dales around Richmond are very crowded in the summer because of tourist traffic. Many camping and caravanning sites have been set up. Some farmers have started Bed and Breakfast for tourists.
The tourists have awakened an interest in old crafts such as Corn Dolly making and Spinning and Weaving which now take place in the village.
